tool_category_insights.bi_tools: Access table formats primarily through database connectors, limited direct format interaction
tool_category_insights.elt_platforms: Increasing native format output capabilities, destination-dependent feature support
tool_category_insights.analytics_engines: Provide foundation for format support, drive ecosystem adoption patterns

connector_patterns.snowflake_iceberg: Primary driver of Iceberg adoption in BI ecosystem
connector_patterns.databricks_delta: Core platform for Delta Lake accessibility
connector_patterns.trino_universal: Multi-format access layer for diverse ecosystems

feature_maturity.query_pushdown: Mature across Iceberg and Delta, limited for Hudi

strategic_implications: Delta Lake benefits from Microsoft/Databricks ecosystem integration
Hudi remains specialized for streaming/real-time use cases
BI tool adoption follows analytics engine support patterns
Multi-format strategies require careful platform selection
data_quality_notes: High confidence in analytics engine capabilities
Medium confidence in BI tool connector behaviors
Feature support evolves rapidly - quarterly updates recommended
Configuration requirements vary significantly by implementation
